title: Love is in the Air
description: LOVE IS IN THE AIR is a showcase for a range of authors of romantic short stories.Some of the short stories featured in this anthology are related to Valentine's Day. This day instils fear in some and they will do anything to escape the dreaded cupid. Others are thrust into the world of romance by forces they cannot control, and some reminisce about times gone by.The range of romantic stories continues with the way a marriage is tested, how a difference in culture can bring people together over a simple meal, and how an inscription on a bench reminds people of a love two people shared.All in all, a wonderful collection to read at your leisure whilst travelling to work, waiting for a friend or unwinding after a busy day.Dip into our world of short stories...
author: Vanessa Wester
